title: What is the best ayurvedic tonic to increase blood for an above 53 age women?
description: Answer (1 of 5): Blood amount cannot be increased by Ayurvedic drug. Blood transfusion does that. This is a forcing method. Blood can be improved in quality by Ayurvedic tonics. What is required is quality. Then body makes up the quantity as required.
